content:
Patient Care welcomes implementer feedback on J#26904 either by joining our zoom call on Thurs, April 30 at 5pm Eastern [1], commenting here, or commenting directly on the JIRA.

For context, a new COVID-19 IG [2] has:

  • profiled Condition to represent symptom presence, despite base spec guidance [3] that generally says use Observation.
  • profiled Condition to represent symptom absence, despite base spec guidance [4] that says use QuestionnaireResponse or Observation.

[1] https://zoom.us/j/5328571160
[2] https://covid-19-ig.logicahealth.org/index.html
[3] http://build.fhir.org/condition.html#bnr
[4] http://build.fhir.org/condition.html#9.2.4.5
Just a quick update to share that the discussion is continuing on Tuesday, May 12 at 5pm Eastern. Minutes from today's discussion can be found on J#26904
